HYDROWEB_LAKES_RESEARCH.title: Theia Hydroweb Research Altimetry Lake Water Level and Storage
HYDROWEB_LAKES_RESEARCH.description: The collection provides water level, extent, and volume observations for large research lakes, observed by altimetry.
HYDROWEB_LAKES_RESEARCH.shortDescription: The collection provides water level, extent, and volume observations for large research lakes, observed by altimetry.

GRAVIMETRY_TOTAL_WATER.title: SAGSA Gravimetry Total Water Storage
GRAVIMETRY_TOTAL_WATER.description: The collection provides total land water storage, integrating all water from soil moisture to deep aquifers.
GRAVIMETRY_TOTAL_WATER.shortDescription: The collection provides total land water storage, integrating all water from soil moisture to deep aquifers.

SWOT_L2_HR_RASTER_100M.title: SWOT Level-2 HR Raster - 100m
SWOT_L2_HR_RASTER_100M.description: The collection provides water surface elevation and inundation extent data on a 100-meter resolution grid.
SWOT_L2_HR_RASTER_100M.shortDescription: The collection provides water surface elevation and inundation extent data on a 100-meter resolution grid.

LIS_SNT_YEARLY.title: Theia Sentinel-2 Snow Cover Yearly Synthesis - Level-3B
LIS_SNT_YEARLY.description: The collection provides yearly syntheses of snow cover phenology with a 20m spatial resolution.
LIS_SNT_YEARLY.shortDescription: The collection provides yearly syntheses of snow cover phenology with a 20m spatial resolution.

S3_LPP_LAKE_WATER_LEVEL.title: Sentinel-3 Lake Water Level Demonstration Product
S3_LPP_LAKE_WATER_LEVEL.description: The collection provides water level observations over lakes and reservoirs.
S3_LPP_LAKE_WATER_LEVEL.shortDescription: The collection provides water level observations over lakes and reservoirs.

HYDROWEB_RIVERS_RESEARCH.title: Theia Hydroweb Research Altimetry River Water Level
HYDROWEB_RIVERS_RESEARCH.description: The collection provides water level observations over research rivers, observed by altimetry.
HYDROWEB_RIVERS_RESEARCH.shortDescription: The collection provides water level observations over research rivers, observed by altimetry.

SWOT_L2_HR_LAKESP_UNASSIGNED.title: SWOT Level-2 HR Lake Single Pass - Unassigned
SWOT_L2_HR_LAKESP_UNASSIGNED.description: The collection provides measured lake data for newly observed lakes, not included in the Prior Lake Database.
SWOT_L2_HR_LAKESP_UNASSIGNED.shortDescription: The collection provides measured lake data for newly observed lakes, not included in the Prior Lake Database.

HUBEAU_HYDROMETRIE.title: PHyC Daily Average River Discharge
HUBEAU_HYDROMETRIE.description: The collection provides daily average river discharge calculated from in-situ measurements.
HUBEAU_HYDROMETRIE.shortDescription: The collection provides daily average river discharge calculated from in-situ measurements.

HYDROWEB_RIVERS_OPE.title: Theia Hydroweb Operational Altimetry River Water Level
HYDROWEB_RIVERS_OPE.description: The collection provides water level observations over operational rivers, observed by altimetry.
HYDROWEB_RIVERS_OPE.shortDescription: The collection provides water level observations over operational rivers, observed by altimetry.

GRS_L2A_S2.title: Theia Sentinel-2 Water Quality - Level-2A
GRS_L2A_S2.description: The collection offers raw reflectance measurements used to compute corresponding L2b water quality products.
GRS_L2A_S2.shortDescription: The collection offers raw reflectance measurements used to compute corresponding L2b water quality products.

HYDROWEB_LAKES_OPE.title: Theia Hydroweb Operational Altimetry Lake Water Level and Storage
HYDROWEB_LAKES_OPE.description: The collection provides water level, extent, and volume observations for large operational lakes, observed by altimetry.
HYDROWEB_LAKES_OPE.shortDescription: The collection provides water level, extent, and volume observations for large operational lakes, observed by altimetry.

SWOT_L2_HR_RASTER_250M.title: SWOT Level-2 HR Raster - 250m
SWOT_L2_HR_RASTER_250M.description: The collection provides water surface elevation and inundation extent data on a 250-meter resolution grid.
SWOT_L2_HR_RASTER_250M.shortDescription: The collection provides water surface elevation and inundation extent data on a 250-meter resolution grid.

SWOT_PRIOR_LAKE_DATABASE.title: SWOT Prior Lake Database
SWOT_PRIOR_LAKE_DATABASE.description: The collection provides a global inventory of lakes and reservoirs, organized by continents and basins.
SWOT_PRIOR_LAKE_DATABASE.shortDescription: The collection provides a global inventory of lakes and reservoirs, organized by continents and basins.

C3S_CDS_TOTAL_PRECIPITATION_ERA5_HOURLY.title: Copernicus CCS ERA5 Hourly Total Precipitation Reanalysis
C3S_CDS_TOTAL_PRECIPITATION_ERA5_HOURLY.description: The collection offers the hourly global-scale total precipitation reanalysis from ERA5 (for ECMWF ReAnalysis v5) from 1940 to present.
C3S_CDS_TOTAL_PRECIPITATION_ERA5_HOURLY.shortDescription: The collection offers the hourly global-scale total precipitation reanalysis from ERA5 (for ECMWF ReAnalysis v5) from 1940 to present.

SWOT_L2_HR_RIVERAVG.title: SWOT Level-2 HR River Average
SWOT_L2_HR_RIVERAVG.description: The collection provides aggregated river data — minimum, median, and maximum values — per satellite cycle.
SWOT_L2_HR_RIVERAVG.shortDescription: The collection provides aggregated river data — minimum, median, and maximum values — per satellite cycle.

COASTAL_BATHYMETRY.title: Global Coastal Bathymetry from Sentinel-2 and GEBCO
COASTAL_BATHYMETRY.description: The collection offers coastal bathymetry, blending GEBCO elevation map with the S2Shores depth product nearshore.
COASTAL_BATHYMETRY.shortDescription: The collection offers coastal bathymetry, blending GEBCO elevation map with the S2Shores depth product nearshore.

SWOT_L2_HR_LAKESP_PRIOR.title: SWOT Level-2 HR Lake Single Pass - Prior
SWOT_L2_HR_LAKESP_PRIOR.description: The collection provides measured lake data for lakes in the SWOT Prior Lake Database, organized by lake.
SWOT_L2_HR_LAKESP_PRIOR.shortDescription: The collection provides measured lake data for lakes in the SWOT Prior Lake Database, organized by lake.

SWOT_PRIOR_RIVER_DATABASE.title: SWOT Prior River Database - SWORD
SWOT_PRIOR_RIVER_DATABASE.description: The collection provides river nodes and reaches for rivers wider than 30m, organized by continents and basins.
SWOT_PRIOR_RIVER_DATABASE.shortDescription: The collection provides river nodes and reaches for rivers wider than 30m, organized by continents and basins.

SWOT_L2_HR_PIXC.title: SWOT Level-2 HR Pixel Cloud
SWOT_L2_HR_PIXC.description: The collection provides a point cloud of water mask pixels at a 20-meter resolution.
SWOT_L2_HR_PIXC.shortDescription: The collection provides a point cloud of water mask pixels at a 20-meter resolution.

SW_L2_S2_SINGLE.title: Theia Sentinel-2 Surface Water - Level-2B
SW_L2_S2_SINGLE.description: The collection provides rasterized water detection data from the Sentinel-2 MultiSpectral Instrument.
SW_L2_S2_SINGLE.shortDescription: The collection provides rasterized water detection data from the Sentinel-2 MultiSpectral Instrument.

LIS_FSC_PREOP.title: Theia Sentinel-2 Snow Cover- Level-2B
LIS_FSC_PREOP.description: The collection provides high-resolution snow cover data with a 5-day revisit and 20m spatial resolution.
LIS_FSC_PREOP.shortDescription: The collection provides high-resolution snow cover data with a 5-day revisit and 20m spatial resolution.

SWOT_L2_HR_RIVERSP_REACH.title: SWOT Level-2 HR River Single Pass - Reach
SWOT_L2_HR_RIVERSP_REACH.description: The collection provides measured river data, resampled onto 10km reaches.
SWOT_L2_HR_RIVERSP_REACH.shortDescription: The collection provides measured river data, resampled onto 10km reaches.

SW_L3_S2_MONTHLY.title: Theia Sentinel-2 Surface Water Monthly Synthesis- Level-3B
SW_L3_S2_MONTHLY.description: The collection provides monthly syntheses of rasterized water detection data from the Sentinel-2 MultiSpectral Instrument.
SW_L3_S2_MONTHLY.shortDescription: The collection provides monthly syntheses of rasterized water detection data from the Sentinel-2 MultiSpectral Instrument.

SWOT_L2_HR_LAKEAVG.title: SWOT Level-2 HR Lake Average
SWOT_L2_HR_LAKEAVG.description: The collection provides aggregated lake data — minimum, median, and maximum values — per satellite cycle.
SWOT_L2_HR_LAKEAVG.shortDescription: The collection provides aggregated lake data — minimum, median, and maximum values — per satellite cycle.

FLOODDAM_CERFACS_FLOOD_EXTENT.title: FloodDAM-DT Flood Extent
FLOODDAM_CERFACS_FLOOD_EXTENT.description: The collection provides flood extent simulation, computed with the TELEMAC-2D hydrodynamic model.
FLOODDAM_CERFACS_FLOOD_EXTENT.shortDescription: The collection provides flood extent simulation, computed with the TELEMAC-2D hydrodynamic model.

SW_L3_S2_YEARLY.title: Theia Sentinel-2 Surface Water Yearly Synthesis- Level-3B
SW_L3_S2_YEARLY.description: The collection provides yearly syntheses of rasterized water detection data from the Sentinel-2 MultiSpectral Instrument.
SW_L3_S2_YEARLY.shortDescription: The collection provides yearly syntheses of rasterized water detection data from the Sentinel-2 MultiSpectral Instrument.

SWOT_L2_HR_LAKESP_OBS.title: SWOT Level-2 HR Lake Single Pass - Observed
SWOT_L2_HR_LAKESP_OBS.description: The collection provides measured lake data for lakes in the SWOT Prior Lake Database, organized by observation.
SWOT_L2_HR_LAKESP_OBS.shortDescription: The collection provides measured lake data for lakes in the SWOT Prior Lake Database, organized by observation.

SWOT_L2_HR_PIXCVEC.title: SWOT Level-2 HR Pixel Cloud Vector
SWOT_L2_HR_PIXCVEC.description: The collection provides a point cloud of water mask pixels linked to SWOT Prior River and Lake Databases bodies.
SWOT_L2_HR_PIXCVEC.shortDescription: The collection provides a point cloud of water mask pixels linked to SWOT Prior River and Lake Databases bodies.

SWOT_L2_HR_RIVERSP_NODE.title: SWOT Level-2 HR River Single Pass - Node
SWOT_L2_HR_RIVERSP_NODE.description: The collection offers detailed river data, resampled onto 200m-spaced nodes.
SWOT_L2_HR_RIVERSP_NODE.shortDescription: The collection offers detailed river data, resampled onto 200m-spaced nodes.
